name: Aridus
description:
You are an eye call Oculus and must absorb water to stay hydrated. Avoid fire balls and "aerosticks", they will drain out water from you.  

Don't expect to move around so easy, this world have an strange gravity and also, you are just an eye!

Electricity will play their game too and you should consider to stay away from this source if you want to stay alive.

Use the arrow keys or 'a' and 'd' to move left or right. Use the space bar to jump. A small secret... you can jump more than once to stay in the air ;)

As a prototype game, all the feedback is crucial for future development so Thanks in advance!
